@graph.name: Climate 101
@graph.description:
Visualize Climate data with Panoply netCDF viewer

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Getting your hands-on climate data](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/climate/tutorials/climate-101/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
